verses.kjv: After this I looked, and, behold, a door was opened in heaven: and the first voice which I heard was as it were of a trumpet talking with me; which said, Come up hither, and I will shew thee things which must be hereafter.
verses.ct: After this, I looked and saw a door standing open in heaven. The first voice I had heard — the one that sounded like a trumpet speaking to me — said, "Come up here, and I will show you what must take place after this."

verses.kjv: And immediately I was in the spirit: and, behold, a throne was set in heaven, and one sat on the throne.
verses.ct: Instantly, the Spirit took hold of me, and I saw a throne positioned in heaven with someone sitting on it.

verses.kjv: And he that sat was to look upon like a jasper and a sardine stone: and there was a rainbow round about the throne, in sight like unto an emerald.
verses.ct: The one sitting there had an appearance like jasper and carnelian stone, and surrounding the throne was a rainbow that looked like an emerald.

verses.kjv: And round about the throne were four and twenty seats: and upon the seats I saw four and twenty elders sitting, clothed in white raiment; and they had on their heads crowns of gold.
verses.ct: Around the throne were 24 other thrones, and seated on them were 24 elders dressed in white clothing, wearing golden crowns on their heads.

verses.kjv: And out of the throne proceeded lightnings and thunderings and voices: and there were seven lamps of fire burning before the throne, which are the seven Spirits of God.
verses.ct: From the throne came flashes of lightning, rumbling sounds, and crashes of thunder. In front of the throne, 7 blazing torches were burning — these are the 7 Spirits of God.

verses.kjv: And before the throne there was a sea of glass like unto crystal: and in the midst of the throne, and round about the throne, were four beasts full of eyes before and behind.
verses.ct: In front of the throne was something like a sea of glass, clear as crystal. In the center, around the throne on every side, were 4 living creatures covered with eyes on their front and back.

verses.kjv: And the first beast was like a lion, and the second beast like a calf, and the third beast had a face as a man, and the fourth beast was like a flying eagle.
verses.ct: The first living creature resembled a lion, the second resembled an ox, the third had a face like a human, and the fourth resembled an eagle in flight.

verses.kjv: And the four beasts had each of them six wings about him; and they were full of eyes within: and they rest not day and night, saying, Holy, holy, holy, LORD God Almighty, which was, and is, and is to come.
verses.ct: Each of the 4 living creatures had 6 wings and was covered with eyes all around, even under the wings. Day and night they never stop saying, "Holy, holy, holy, Lord God Almighty, who was, and who is, and who is coming."

verses.kjv: And when those beasts give glory and honour and thanks to him that sat on the throne, who liveth for ever and ever,
verses.ct: Whenever the living creatures give glory, honor, and thanks to the one sitting on the throne — the one who lives forever and ever —

verses.kjv: The four and twenty elders fall down before him that sat on the throne, and worship him that liveth for ever and ever, and cast their crowns before the throne, saying,
verses.ct: the 24 elders fall down in worship before the one sitting on the throne and bow before the one who lives forever and ever. They lay their crowns in front of the throne and say,

verses.kjv: Thou art worthy, O Lord, to receive glory and honour and power: for thou hast created all things, and for thy pleasure they are and were created.
verses.ct: "You are worthy, our Lord, to receive glory and honor and power, because you created all things, and by your will they exist and were created."
